menu_crew_management_help: Manage your AI Squad's Characters and Loadouts
dialog_crew_loadout_help_text: The AI Squad will fill the empty player slots in your own lobby as soon as you start the game. By specifying their loadouts in the squad Management you can decide which weapons, abilities and boosts they have. New players that join your game will replace the AI Squad in a bottom up order, starting with loadout number 3.$NL;$NL;Characters will be assigned to the AI Squad according to the selected Character Priority if available.
